TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type ControlCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供使 ASP.NET 服务器控件能够维护其子控件列表的集合容器。

span.span: Provides a collection container that enables ASP.NET server controls to maintain a list of their child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以访问的任何属性和方法类通过属性。You can access any of the properties and methods of the class through the property. 由于类是所有 ASP.NET 服务器控件的基类，所有服务器控件都继承此属性。Since the class is the base class for all ASP.NET server controls, all server controls inherit this property. 有关集合的详细信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For more information about collections, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872). ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写方法来创建两个控件、 名为的自定义类的两个实例`ChildControl`，其中包含名为的字符串属性`Message`。The following code example overrides the method to create two controls, both instances of the custom class named `ChildControl`, which has a string property named `Message`. 在创建时，将两个控件添加到。When created, the two controls are added to the . 每个这些控件，以将其添加到包含此版本的类上调用方法。The method is called on each of these controls to add them to the class that contains this version of . 属性设置为`true`，以便这些控件将不会不必要地再次创建。The property is set to `true` so that these controls will not be created again unnecessarily. [!code-csharp[Control_Sample_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample_1/CS/control_sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_Sample_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample_1/VB/control_sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 对象添加到集合。

span.span: Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新控件添加到的序号索引数组的末尾。The new control is added to the end of an ordinal index array. 该控件可以是任何 ASP.NET 服务器控件，您创建的自定义服务器控件或文字控件的实例。The control can be an instance of any ASP.NET server control, a custom server control you create, or a literal control. 若要将控件添加到集合中的特定索引位置处，使用方法。To add a control to the collection at a specific index location, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将添加一系列模板项目，其中许多从服务器控件的视图状态，转到自定义模板化控件。The following code example uses the method to add a series of template items, the number of which are taken from the server control's view state, to a custom templated control. [!code-csharp[TemplatedDataBoundControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl/CS/templatedataboundcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TemplatedDataBoundControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl/VB/templatedataboundcontrol.vb#2)]

summary.span: 从当前服务器控件的 对象中移除所有控件。

span.span: Removes all controls from the current server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可为空的自定义控件当您重写和方法。Use this method to empty a custom control's when you override the and methods. 开发复合、 模板化控件或模板化的数据绑定控件时执行此操作。Do this when you develop composite, templated controls or templated data-bound controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，并使用方法来删除中的所有子控件之前对象。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method, and using the method to delete all child controls previously in the object. 在这种情况下，您必须执行此操作，以便在控件中的对象已过时不适当地显示出来。In this case, you must do this so that outdated objects in your control's are not displayed inappropriately. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个方法，通过枚举的集合控件， `myButton`。The following code example creates a method that enumerates through the collection of a control, `myButton`. 创建枚举器时，属性进行检查以查看该操作是否线程安全的以及如果不是，属性用于获取一个对象以使操作线程安全的。When the enumerator is created, the property is checked to see if the operation is thread safe, and if it is not, the property is used to obtain an object to make the operation thread safe. 当完成枚举、 的值属性形式写入属性的包含页上的控件。When the enumeration is completed, the value of the property is written as the property of a control on the containing page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples/CS/controlcollection1_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples/VB/controlcollection1_vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个方法，通过枚举的集合控件， `myButton`。The following code example creates a method that enumerates through the collection of a control, `myButton`. 创建枚举器时，属性进行检查以查看该操作是否线程安全的以及如果不是，属性用于获取一个对象以使操作线程安全的。When the enumerator is created, the property is checked to see if the operation is thread safe, and if it is not, the property is used to obtain an object to make the operation thread safe. 枚举完成时，值属性形式写入属性的包含页上的控件。When the enumeration is complete, the value of the property is written as the property of a control on the containing page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples/CS/controlcollection1_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples/VB/controlcollection1_vb.aspx#2)]
